Hero.title: Incorporate in a Click.
Hero.content: Incorporate your company in Belgium in just seven days. Entirely online.

Introduction.introParagraph: We provide a unified online platform for the entire incorporation process. Focus on what matters, instead of the paperwork.
Introduction.linkText: Learn why you should create your company in Belgium
Introduction.feature5: The ideal accountant for your business

HowItWorks.additionalText: Creating a company has never been so easy.
HowItWorks.questionnaireDescription: Describe your company, how it will work and make money.
HowItWorks.financialPlanDescription: We assist in the creation of your personalized financial plan. You just verify and sign it.
HowItWorks.meetingNotaryDescription: Our notary writes the articles of incorporation and bylaws, and you e-sign them in an online meeting.
HowItWorks.companyPackageDescription: We send you all your important documents, and prepare your file for the accountant, bank and insurance.

Testimonials.review: Seven Seed helped me create my company quickly and efficiently. Great communication and responsiveness!

Resources.introText: Everything you need to run your company after it’s created.
Resources.additionalText: We’ll connect you to our community of hundreds of partners and get you special deals for each of them.
Resources.exclusivePerksDescription: Access to special deals and perks for dozens of popular tools and services, at highly reduced rates.
Resources.partnersNetworkDescription: We introduce you to the perfect partners for your type of business.
Resources.communityDescription: Access to an exclusive community of Belgian entrepreneurs, startups and investors.

FreeChapters.heading: Get the free whitepaper
FreeChapters.description: Enter your email address and we’ll send you our free whitepaper on company creation in Belgium.

Pricing.subDescription: Both our packages give access to the Seven Seed community of founders and startups.
Pricing.basicPlanName: Basic - Your SRL in Seven Days
Pricing.basicPlanDescription: Everything you need, and a bit more.
Pricing.foreignEntrepreneurPlanDescription: Special package for non-Belgians. Includes a company address in Flanders.
Pricing.foreignEntrepreneurPlanFeature2: Your own office address in Flanders

Footer.copyright: Seven Seed SRL. All rights reserved.
